article_title: Presentation: Revenue cycle challenged by price transparency
article_text: According to Florida Hospital Vice President of Finance Jeffrey Hurst, a hospital's revenue cycle and its price transparency measures are forever linked and good management of one benefits the other. The executive touched on this, and other points related to billing and the patient's responsibility, during his presentation, "Maintaining Financial Strength and Boosting Patient Satisfaction," at this past Sunday's Revenue Cycle Solutions Summit at the HIMSS15 conference. Here are his slides, for those who could not make the event.

og.description: Florida Hospital Vice President of Finance Jeffrey Hurst shows how hospitals and patients can use open pricing information to improve the process.
